title: The Climb
lyrics: I can almost see it There’s a voice inside my head sayin, You’ll never reach it, Every step I’m taking, Lost with no direction My faith is shaking but I got to keep trying Got to k eep my head held h igh There’s always going to be another mountain Always going to be an uphill battle, Sometimes you going to have to lose, Ain’t about how fast I get there, Ain’t about what’s waiting on the other s ide  It’s the cl imb The struggles I’m facing, Sometimes they knock me down but No, I’m not breaking I may not know it, I’m going to remember most yeah Just got to keep going And I, I got to be s trong Just keep pushing on, There’s always going to be another mountain Always going to be an uphill battle, Sometimes you going to have to lose, Ain’t about how fast I get there, Ain’t about what’s waiting on the other s ide  It’s the cl imb    There’s always going to be another mountain Always going to be an uphill battle, Som etimes you going to have to lose , Ain’t about how fast I get there, Ain’t about what’s waiting on the other s ide  It’s the cl imb Keep on m oving, keep climbing, keep the faith baby It’s all about, it’s all about The c limb Keep the faith Keep the fa ith
